mapper.select: SELECT * FROM subjects WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY update_time DESC
SELECT s.*, u.username as creator_username FROM subjects s INNER JOIN users u ON s.user_id = u.id WHERE s.visibility = 'public' ORDER BY s.update_time DESC

SELECT s.*, u.username as creator_username FROM subjects s INNER JOIN users u ON s.user_id = u.id WHERE s.visibility = 'public' AND (s.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR s.description LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')) ORDER BY s.update_time DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM subjects WHERE name = #{name} AND user_id = #{userId} LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO subjects (name, description, user_id, visibility, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{name}, #{description}, #{userId}, #{visibility}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
